reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size with a perfect knee-length, and appreciate its soft, flowy material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrapped in Fall Eleganceâ€”And Yes, There Are Pockets!
items.body: Elegant, comfy, and surprisingly pocketedâ€”this dress is a fall favorite! ðŸ‚ðŸ‘— I bought the Dokotoo Womenâ€™s 2025 Fall Wrap V-Neck Long Sleeve Empire Waist Dress for a cozy-yet-polished autumn look, and it totally delivered. Itâ€™s like the dress version of a warm hug with a side of sass. ðŸŒŸ What I Loved: â€¢ Flattering Fit: The empire waist and wrap V-neck combo gave me shape without clinging. Itâ€™s flowy in all the right places and cinched where it counts. â€¢ Soft & Stretchy Fabric: Itâ€™s made of a viscose-polyamide blend with a touch of elastane, so it moves with youâ€”not against you. Perfect for dancing at weddings or reaching for cookies at brunch. â€¢ Surprise Pockets! I didnâ€™t expect them, but theyâ€™re thereâ€”and theyâ€™re deep enough for a phone or a snack. Instant bonus points. â€¢ Versatile Style: I wore it with boots and a chunky necklace for a fall festival, then swapped in heels and earrings for a dinner date. Itâ€™s a chameleon in dress form. â€¢ Color & Drape: The fabric has a subtle sheen and drapes beautifully. I got compliments from strangers and one very fashionable llama (long story). ðŸ§µ Sizing Tip: Iâ€™m usually a US size 8 and went with a Mediumâ€”fit like a dream. Check the size chart, though, because the empire waist means the bust fit matters more than usual. ðŸ¦‹ Final Verdict: Whether youâ€™re headed to a pumpkin patch, a party, or just want to feel like the main character in a rom-com set in Vermont, this dress is a winner. Itâ€™s elegant without being fussy, and comfy without looking casual. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very plain and simple
items.body: This dress is very modest. The v neck opening is sewed together up pretty high. The material is thin but I was able to wear black underwear with it and it wasn't too see thru. It stretches very nicely but at the same time sits snug around the body. The fabric is soft and smooth, of a nice light color just like pictured. Read more
items.author: Tanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice.!!!!
items.body: I love this dress! It was perfect! Iâ€™m just under 5â€™2 and an 144lbs. The dress fit all the right spots. The length hit my knee just perfect. Very flattering and received a ton of compliments. I can wear it with sandals of a summer day or dressed up. Super cute and comfortable! Read more
items.author: flor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not made for short people
items.body: This dress was not flattering on me. I am short and it was too long and the pockets made it stick out more at hips. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for a casual day/evening or for something where a little bit is needed.
items.body: Pros: Dress is very comfortable and looks good in. Hangs nicely and thr material has a nice stretchy give to it. I found the fit to be true to size. The material is more of a sheer material vs a softer cotton/polyester. Con: Says hand wash only. Have not braved trying to use the handwash or gentle cycle on the machine yet. Read more
items.author: Ctraum

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fabric feels soft and comfy
items.body: Got this dress for my daughter to wear to a family event, and it looked so cute on her. The color was true to the picture and the fit was just right. The material is nice. Definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: J Gallegos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy breezy fall or winter wardrobe staple
items.body: This is the perfect fall or winter dress. Can wear alone or with tights, easy to dress up or down depending on footwear choices. Flattering fit, fits true to size. Nice wardrobe staple and high quality feel! Read more
items.author: Heather M

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Are you tall and thin? I'm not
items.body: Not for high-waisted or busty women. Really. I'm serious. I looked like I gained at least 10 pounds just putting it on. So why 2 stars? It's soft and seemed well-made. I size up for a fitted bust and did that here. Because the style and cut are the problem, I gave them the benefit of the doubt that a tall, thin person might look better. Usually, a belt or a safety pin can pull the dress in if necessary because the picture looked like the waist would hit at a natural high waist. It did not. The waistband was just below the bust. The point of the "V" was approximately 2 inches from the top of the waistband... I couldn't tell if it was an illusion though. I did try to pull it down to see if it would stretch in the right place, but that just made the V lower so that didn't work either. So that was it for this one. I took this dress off as fast as I could at that point and then tried on one of my old dresses to make sure I hadn't actually gained weight. (All good, so there will be no picture of me in this dress - ever.) Good luck with sighs of envy to my tall, thin friends. The length of thr dress and the length of thr sleeves was good. Read more
items.author: Lilac135

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Purple, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
